name: Cube Simulator (EhKindaGames)
description:
Have you ever wanted to be a cube? Well then this is the game for you! Sit down, relax, listen to the complete lack of sfx or music, and look at that cube! Some features of this game include:

-The responsive lack of controls

-Beautiful graphics

-An engaging story

-and much more!

Download Cube Simulator today and do absolutely nothing.
